dlgLine.text: I'll get right down to it. The leadership here is no longer doing the job needed to keep this place together.
<To you> I wasn't here to make the decision to put you in charge, but clearly, you have no idea what you're doing and it's only a matter of time before it compromises the safety of this location.
I'm nominating myself to take immediate control of this shelter. To avoid a power struggle, our former leadership will be exiled. Do I have your support?
<To you>This is a serious proposal... If Paul has overwhelming support, he will be elected as the rightful leader of this place.
The current morale around here tells me that...
I'm afraid the people here aren't going to accept a change of leadership right now.
Given their feelings about our current leadership, the people here would accept this change.
Paul has proven himself valuable before...
But he's in the wrong here. I support <charname> as leader.
And I think he would make a fine leader.
Let's see. Do I stand to gain anything from this...
Paul's made his opinion about me very clear. I'll stay with the current management, thanks.
I hate to say it, but my vote's yours if you need it, Rainier.
The answer's pretty clear to me...
I'll stick with the devil I know.
Even Paul would be better.
Basing my vote on what people are telling me about the leadership here...
I don't think Paul will be accepted as leader.
I believe the people here would be open to this.
You know, I can appreciate Paul's military service...
But I don't think it necessarily makes him fit to be a leader. I will continue to serve the current administration.
And I think it's just what this place needs. Sorry, <charname>, but I just feel it's for the best.
The votes have been cast...
The majority of the votes are in favor of removing you from the shelter.
Thank you. I promise that I will do everything I can to keep the people here alive, fed, and safe.
<To you> Now... I'm afraid I have to ask you to leave. Please don't make me do this the hard way.

dlgAnsw.text: Wait! Let's talk! Davis? Someone?! Don't throw me out!
You deserve it, Paul. It's only a matter of time before one of them puts a bullet in the back of your head.
You sons of bitches! After all I did for you! I want a recount!

dlgLine.text: The majority of the votes are in favor of keeping you as leader.

dlgAnsw.text: Good... Then this meeting is over.
Not so fast, Paul - I cannot let what you did go unpunished.

dlgLine.text: I did what I thought needed to be done... You do what you have to.

dlgAnsw.text: Hmm... You're lucky I still need you. For now, you can stay.
I'm going to shake hands, and I'm going to put this behind us. For the sake of the shelter.
If the people support you so much, they can feed you. No rations for a week.
For attempting mutiny against me, you will be exiled from this shelter immediately.
For your betrayal, I sentence you to death. To be carried out immediately. <Kill Paul>

dlgLine.text: I did what I thought was right, and I will continue to do so. But if you're willing to keep me on, I'll give you a second chance.
That's more than I expected.
I'm more than willing to give you another chance, considering how you handled this.
That's fair.
This won't make the people here any safer. But I would do the same to avoid the risk of this place breaking into factions. I'll go peacefully.
<Paul grabs his wound and looks at you.>
...It won't be long... they'll get brave... they'll come for you.

dlgAnsw.text: <Paul is dragged out and the meeting is adjourned.>

dlgLine.text: I believe this meeting is over.

dlgAnsw.text: <You remain in control of the shelter.>
